content: k2 sl1p k1 until there are 30 32 34 36 sts on your repeat rnds 2 3 to shape the gusset cont in this way decreasing needle turn 30 32 34 36 sts by two stitches at the gusset on every other round until there are row 2 sl1p p to end turn 60 64 68 72 sts on the needle row 3 sl1p k1 to end turn once you have reached the required number of stitches repeat row 2 3 until heel measures 5 6 7 8 cm or desired length cont to work each round in pattern as set until you reach 5cm finishing on row 3 before the desired length ready to start the toes don t be afraid to try your sock on before decreasing for the toes turn heel row 1 sl1p p16 17 18 19 p2tog p1 turn toes row 2 sl1p k5 ssk k1 turn row 3 sl1p p6 p2tog p1 turn note at some point whilst decreasing for the toes if you are using a short circular needle you may need to change back to row 4 sl1p k7 ssk k1 turn dpns or use the magic loop method as the number of stitches cont in this way adding one stitch between slip_stitch and ssk becomes too small for the circular it s up to you when you or p2tog on each row ie row 5 sl1p p8 p2tog p1 turn choose to do that and how you distribute the stitches across row 6 sl1p k9 ssk k1 turn etc until all of the heel sts are the needles just keep following the pattern as set below used depending on how many sts are in your heel flap you may find that the k1 and p1 stitch is not required at the end of the last two row create the toes as follows knit across heel sts if required to bring you to the left hand side of the heel flap with the outside of the flap facing you round 1 k1 ssk k24 26 28 30 sts k2tog k1 place marker ready to pick up 1 stitch for every 2 row of heel flap knitted if required k1 ssk k24 26 28 30 sts k2tog k1 remember that if you made the heel flap bigger you will need 56 60 64 68 sts to pick up more stitches once you have picked up the stitches round 2 knit one round slipping markers as you come to them place marker round 3 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 slip marker work across the top of the foot sts in rib pattern as set place k1 ssk k to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 52 56 60 64 sts marker then pick up 1 stitch for every 2 row of heel flap repeat rnds 2 3 until you have 28 28 32 32 sts left and knitted up the other side of the heel knit across the top
